programme.title: Cookies Fortune
programme.desc: Cookies Fortune unfolds over an eventful Easter weekend in the small town of Holly Springs, Mississippi. The town residents are peaceful, kind folk--with the exception of Camille Dixon (Glenn Close) - a pushy theatre director with an incredibly shy younger sister, Cora (Julianne Moore), whose estranged daughter Emma (Liv Tyler) has just returned to town. On the heels of her latest play, Camille is shocked to discover that her Aunt Jewel Mae "Cookie" Orcutt (Patricia Neal) has committed suicide. Terrified at the thought of how this will tarnish the family name, she eats the suicide note to make it look like a burglary. This set-up leads the police to one main suspect, Willis Richland (Charles S. Dutton), who also happens to be Cookies best friend. Although the rest of the town is convinced Willis didnt commit the crime, an outside investigator (Courtney B. Vance) isnt so sure. As Easter Sunday and opening night of the play arrive, the truth comes out, revealing more secrets than anyone could have possibly imagined.

programme.title: The Groomsmen
programme.desc: A 30-something man decides to marry his pregnant girlfriend and asks his four best friends to stand with him at the wedding, but as he observes his friends relationship troubles, he wrestles with issues of fatherhood, marriage and growing up.

programme.title: Absentia
programme.desc: Tricias husband Daniel has been missing for seven years. Her younger sister Callie comes to live with her as the pressure mounts to finally declare him "dead in absentia." As Tricia sifts through the wreckage and tries to move on with her life, Callie finds herself drawn to an ominous tunnel near the house. As she begins to link it to other mysterious disappearances, it becomes clear that Daniels presumed death might be anything but "natural." The ancient force at work in the tunnel might have set its sights on Callie and Tricia ... and Daniel might be suffering a fate far worse than death in its grasp.

programme.title: Lost in Florence
programme.desc: A heartbroken American in Florence gets involved in a dangerous local sport -- and with an alluring local woman.

programme.title: Shoreditch
programme.desc: Set both on the eve of World War II in a shady Shoreditch nightclub and in present-day London. Thirtysomething Tom tries to solve a murder that was committed in the club decades before.

programme.title: Caesar
programme.desc: Epic look at Julius Caesar, Romes last dictator, whose death also signaled the end of the Roman Republic. Chronicles his campaigns in Gaul and Egypt, his rivalry with General Pompey, and his eventual assassination at the hands of Brutus and Cassius.

programme.title: House of the Stone Monkeys
programme.desc: The action proceeds along two tracks and two time frames. We meet the boy, who lives with his mother in a Budapest apartment house, in the summer of 2012. Another boy is spending his vacation with his grandparents in the same building in the summer of 1982. The house unveils its mysterious secret to both of them.

programme.title: Raspberry Magic
programme.desc: "Raspberry Magic" is a coming-of-age story about 11-year-old Monica Shah, who thinks she must win the science fair in order to bring her father back after he runs out on the family. She blames herself for her parents problems, and takes charge when her mother falls into a deep depression. Set behind the backdrop of a beautiful forest, Monicas experiment uses touch therapy to help raspberries grow faster. She asks, is it nature or nurture that can truly help a being grow? Does it even matter? Through her ups and downs with her family, she learns that its a complex question, and the answer isnt so simple.

programme.title: Baba
programme.desc: An weird but witty old woman is forced to deal with an ambiguous future after her country, family and the entire system of values are ruined. She is trying to solve her existential problems catching d trying to sell a rewarded war criminal as he was a rabbit in a wood. The only thing she did not know if he is really him.

programme.title: The Old Man and the Gun
programme.desc: David Lowerys crime biopic stars Robert Redford as Forrest Tucker, a real-life bank robber who found himself wanted by police across the United States for a string of prison escapes and robberies. We first meet Tucker in the early 80s. Hes 74 and has been evading police for two years since his last audacious prison break. But hes not taking things easy and laying low. Thats not his bag. This suave old geezer has a somehow enamouring way of walking into a bank, charmingly informing the teller that he has a gun that he doesnt want to use, and walking out with a big old sack of cash. In fact, hes just done exactly that when he meets Jewel (Sissy Spacek), an enchanting farmer who he quickly trusts so much that he decides to reveal to her his true identity. Tucker, alongside spending time on Jewels farm enjoying her more simplistic way of life, embarks on a string of heists. On the case is local detective John Hunt (Casey Affleck), and Tucker soon finds himself torn between the peaceful life hes enjoyed with Jewel and his old criminal ways. Also starring Danny Glover and Tom Waits.

programme.title: Foolproof
programme.desc: Kevin, Samantha and Rob live for Foolproof; their own private club where through high-tech, meticulously thought out and executed plans, they pull off the most impossible of heists - all in theory that is. Theyve never actually done it for real. But all that changes when Leo, a cutthroat British gangster, rips off their foolproof plans for a diamond heist and uses it to successfully execute the robbery. Threatening to implicate them, Leo blackmails them to pull off a robbery worth $20 million in corporate bonds.

programme.title: I Could Never Be Your Woman
programme.desc: Rosie, a divorced mother, lives with her daughter in LA. But her life is not exactly ideal. The tv show she has been working on seems doomed. Her ex-husband just had a baby with a younger woman, while her daughter has started dating boys!

programme.title: Corner Office
programme.desc: The story of a compulsive bureaucrat, Orson, who discovers a secret room.

programme.title: Headwinds
programme.desc: Based on Olivier Adams bestselling novel, "Des Vents Contraires," it tells the story of Paul. Since his wife, Sarah, disappeared without a trace, Paul lives alone with his two young children. But a year has passed, a year in which he had to reinvent himself every day—and Paul is exhausted.

programme.title: Castle Falls
programme.desc: Action movie. After years of neglect, a building-landmark will be demolished with dynamite. What a few people know is that inside it hides the cash a gang leader stole from his rivals. Will the interested parties reach the treasure in time?

programme.title: The Good Girl
programme.desc: A discount store clerk strikes up an affair with a stock boy who considers himself the incarnation of Holden Caulfield.Justine is a sullen 30-year-old woman stuck in a dead-end job at the Retail Rodeo department store.In addition to her mind-numbing occupation, Justine also has to contend with her dim-witted husband, Phil, and his partner, Bubba, who work as house painters when they arent smoking pot and staring blankly at the television.Justine sees an opportunity for change, however, when she meets Holden, a fellow Retail Rodeo employee who is even more depressed than herself.The young Holden and Justine soon begin a passionate secret affair, unaware that it may not be so secret after all.

programme.title: Hangman
programme.desc: Mystery movie. American mystery, produced in 2017. Retired homicide detective Ray Archer and his partner, ex FBI agent Will Ruiney, are assigned to track down a vicious serial killer, who is playing a twisted version of the childrens game Hangman.

programme.title: The Cooler
programme.desc: Bernie Lootz (William H. Macy) is a long-time "cooler" at the Shangri-La casino in Las Vegas: he is paid to bring his black cloud to any table where a gambler is on a roll. But when Bernies luck starts changing for the better--thanks in part to a pretty cocktail waitress--he suddenly loses his cooling talents, incurring the ire of the casino owner in the process.

programme.title: Remembrance
programme.desc: Remembrance depicts a remarkable love story that blossomed amidst the terror of a German concentration camp in 1944 Poland. This impossible passion fuels the courage of a Polish prisoner who manages to rescue his Jewish girlfriend. Against all odds, they escape the camp and survive a treacherous journey to freedom. But during the chaos of the end of the war, they are forcibly separated and each is convinced that the other has died. More than thirty years later in New York, the happily married 52-year-old woman accidentally finds out that her former Polish lover is still alive. And she has to see him again.

programme.title: Caesar
programme.desc: Epic look at Julius Caesar, Romes last dictator, whose death also signaled the end of the Roman Republic. Chronicles his campaigns in Gaul and Egypt, his rivalry with General Pompey, and his eventual assassination at the hands of Brutus and Cassius.

programme.title: No Limit Kids
programme.desc: Ashton, Celeste, and Becca are three unlikely middle school outcasts who form a club in an abandoned theater. There, they meet Charlie (Bill Cobbs, Night at the Museum), a homeless man who shares their passion for musical theater. When the theater is scheduled to be torn down, the teenagers set out to save the landmark with a modern-day performance of Shakespeares Much Ado About Nothing. Along the way, the group learns to treat others with respect and stand up for their beliefs. This Dove-approved film also features Emmy and Golden Globe nominee Lee Meriwether.

programme.title: Uncle Nino
programme.desc: A distant, slightly dysfunctional family is brought closer together when the fathers long-estranged Uncle Nino comes from Italy to Chicago for a surprise visit.

programme.title: The Lucky Dragon
programme.desc: A young, Chinese dragon punished by the gods to be a mere mortal is cast down to earth. He is forced to make his way in a strange land until the evil forces discover his true identity. Take part in a world full of imagination while following the journey of a mischievous dragon who has been transformed by magic into a little boy and exiled from his home to live among humans. When both good and evil forces learn that a dragon has arrived, they look for him as he is the only one who can find the magical sword—whose owner can rule the universe! Will he find the sword in time before it gets into the wrong hands? Will he ever become a dragon again?

programme.title: Suits on the Loose
programme.desc: The story of Ben Sweet (Nick Roth), an eighteen-year-old middle-class man who enrolls at the University of California, Berkeley, in 1968 to study accounting and avoid the draft. There, he plunges into a life of sex, drugs, and rock n roll, as well as political activism that turns his conservative world upside down and sets him on a path of self-discovery.

programme.title: North and South: The Battle of New Market
programme.desc: Based on a true story of the American Civil War, culminating at the Battle of New Market, May 1864. A group of teenage cadets sheltered from war at the Virginia Military Institute must confront the horrors of an adult world when they are called upon to defend the Shenandoah Valley. Leaving behind their youth, these cadets must decide what they are fighting for.

programme.title: Max Cloud
programme.desc: A space cruiser crash lands on the purple planet of Heinous, an intergalactic prison that is home to the most vile and dangerous villains in the galaxy. All of the crew have perished except for its pilot; intergalactic space hero Max Cloud, the ships hapless chef Jake, and its reluctant Commander, Rexy. Their mission is simple, wait inside their vessel until help arrives and try their best to keep the prisoners outside from getting in, however this is Max Cloud and he doesnt do simple. ...But this is not real life. This is a video-game, and at the helm of the adventure is Sarah, a teenage video game fanatic who immerses herself in fantasy to avoid dealing with her less than packed social life and a strained relationship with her dad, straight laced single parent Tony. After a fallout, Tony bans Sarah from playing games and in a frenzy of teenage emotion Sarah makes a wish, that in the blink of an eye becomes a reality... With a flash of pixelated light Sarah is transported into the video game by the mysterious Space Witch, who exists in an etherial void, behind a secret door, that never appears in the same place twice! So Sarah finds herself trapped inside the game and the only person who can help her is her equally socially defunct but incredibly charming friend, Cowboy, who must control Sarah from her bedroom in Brooklyn and keep her from losing her one life, in a game that cant be paused, that they have never finished before! To make matters worse Sarah has not found herself inside the body of the wonderful Max Cloud, but Jake, thats right... the hapless chef. We follow Sarah as she negotiates the terrifying and dangerous planet of Heinous alongside the ever confident Max and fed up Rexy, jumping back and forth with the real world as the pressure mounts on Cowboy and the real stakes start to rise. They soon encounter stranded Bounty Hunter, Brock Donnelly, and realise they must get off the planet before help arrives as the planets surface burns so hot every day that anything not underground is space liquid! AND to add to the stakes Cowboy must keep his best friend away from the evil clutches of the games villain Revengor, a part man, part machine, lunatic who is hell bent on taking Max Clouds ship and with an army of prisoners and an evil sorcersss called SHEE, his chances look pretty damn good. The action bounces between the video game and the real world as Cowboy and Sarah must come together to get her home, all leading to the ultimate showdown in Revengors lair, where back in Brooklyn, video game expertise arrives in the form of a very unlikely hero. Sit down. Plug in. Its time to play THE INTERGALACTIC ADVENTURES OF MAX CLOUD.

programme.title: 10 Things We Should Do Before We Break Up
programme.desc: Abigail, a self-sufficient single mom meets Ben. They both think every great relationship ends in disaster. On the first date they come up with 10 things to do together before they break up. But the estimated end is not so sure - because fate adds #11 to their list.

programme.title: Con Man
programme.desc: The story of Barry Minkow, a young charismatic business man who becomes a wealthy CEO by lying, cheating and stealing his way to the top.

programme.title: Cleanskin
programme.desc: Thriller. Thriller, produced in 2012. Co-produced by the USA and the UK. A British secret service agent is faced with the task of pursuing and eliminating a British-born suicide bomber and his terrorist cell.

programme.title: Citizen Verdict
programme.desc: Marty Rockman, producer of the hit reality show "So Sue Me," has a brand new concept: "Citizen Verdict." Every week, a real-life criminal case will be tried before the American people, but this time, they will also be the jury. If the defendant is found guilty in a death penalty case, Rockman will broadcast the execution.

programme.title: The Defender
programme.desc: Today - the global war on terror rages on. The United States will not give an inch against terrorists, especially Mohamed Jamar, considered to be the worst of them all. Jamar has been missing for months, but his network continues its function. The President stands firm before the world, but behind the scenes his teams are working to find the final solution. Jamar represents a paradox: he can never be killed, because if found dead he would become an instant martyr. If caught he must be tried. If he is found guilty he would become a martyr and further inspiration to acts of terror. If acquitted, the policies of the entire western world would be destroyed. So he must remain invisible. Roberta Jones, the head of the National Security Agency, is working to ensure he remains invisible, forever. Under the guise of attending an Eastern European conference on Terror in Romania, she attends a secret meeting with Jamar at a secluded hotel outside Bucharest. No one knows about this meeting and her goal is to buy his invisibility. Her only companions are her security team of six headed by her personal bodyguard, Lance Rockford. They are the best of the best, former military special forces personnel capable of anything. When they arrive at the hotel for the secret meeting they are ambushed no one is supposed to know about the meeting, but someone wants it stopped. They have to fight for their lives against an unknown attacker. Lance, a man of highest integrity with an impressive record of service for his country, is forced into a situation which challenges his very beliefs...

programme.title: Modigliani
programme.desc: American drama, produced in 2004. An American, French, German, Italian, Rumanian, and British co-production. The story of Amedeo Modiglianis bitter rivalry with Pablo Picasso, and his tragic romance with Jeanne Hebuterne.

programme.title: Ātrāk
programme.desc: Draivers ir pavadījis cietumā 10 gadus. Viņa vienīgais mērķis ir atriebties par brāļa slepkavību, kas notikusi neveiksmīgas laupīšanas laikā, pēc kuras Draivers nonāca cietumā. Tagad brīvībā nonākušajam vīrietim ir upuru saraksts, un viņš sāk īstenot atriebības plānu. Viņam pēdas dzen padzīvojis policists, kuram līdz pensijai atlikušas vien dažas dienas, un jauns, egoistisks snaiperis, kurš slepkavības uztver kā mākslu. Mednieks ir kļuvis par medīto. Šajā nāvējošajā sacensībā atklāsies jaunas nianses par Draivera brāļa slepkavību, kas liks nojaust, ka sarakstā nav iekļauti visi vainīgie.

programme.title: Malholanda ceļš
programme.desc: Uz līkumotā Malholanda ceļa Losandželosā naktī notikusi avārija. Attopoties notikuma vietā, jauna sieviete neko neatceras, pat ne to, kas ir viņa pati. Viss šķiet mulsinošs kā sirreālā sapnī. Tāds apjukums, tik daudz neatbildētu jautājumu! Pavisam citādi jūtas Betija, kura tikko ieradusies Holivudā. Cerību spārnotajai jaunajai aktrisei te viss šķiet brīnišķīgs, īsts sapņu piepildījums! Kopīgiem spēkiem abas mēģinās saprast, kas patiesībā noticis. Filma ieguva Cēzara balvu kategorijā "Labākā filma svešvalodā". Deivids Linčs par šo filmu ieguva Kannu kinofestivāla balvu "Labākais režisors", dalot šo balvu ar Džoelu Koenu, kā arī tika nominēts Amerikas Kinoakadēmijas balvai. "Malholanda ceļš" bieži tiek minēta kā Linča labākā filma. 2016. gada "BBC 100 labāko 21. gadsimta filmu" sarakstā "Malholanda ceļš" ierindojās pirmajā vietā.

programme.title: Slow TV
programme.desc: Rudens upe.

programme.title: Kas skatāms Filmzone?
programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone filmām.

programme.title: Ātrāk
programme.desc: Draivers ir pavadījis cietumā 10 gadus. Viņa vienīgais mērķis ir atriebties par brāļa slepkavību, kas notikusi neveiksmīgas laupīšanas laikā, pēc kuras Draivers nonāca cietumā. Viņam pēdas dzen padzīvojis policists, kuram līdz pensijai atlikušas vien dažas dienas, un jauns, egoistisks snaiperis, kurš slepkavības uztver kā mākslu. Mednieks ir kļuvis par medīto. Šajā nāvējošajā sacensībā atklāsies jaunas nianses par Draivera brāļa slepkavību, kas liks nojaust, ka sarakstā nav iekļauti visi vainīgie.

programme.title: Laika patruļa
programme.desc: Pagaidu aģentu (Ītans Houks) nosūta atpakaļ laikā, lai notvertu teroristu, pirms viņš detonē vairākus spridzekļus un nogalina tūkstošiem nevainīgu cilvēku. Meklējot slepkavu, slepenais aģents kļūst par bārmeni. Bārā viņš iepazīstas ar kādu klientu (Sāra Snūka), kurš izstāsta, kā viņš ticis uzaudzināts kā sieviete un ka viņam atņemts bērns. Kad aģents piedāvā šim cilvēkam atgriezties pagātnē un atrast sava bērna tēvu, klients piekrīt. Abi kopā dodas atpakaļ laikā, lai atriebtu savu pagātni.

programme.title: Aplaupīt 30 minūtēs
programme.desc: Niks ir picu piegādātājs, kura dzīve sagriežas kājām gaidā brīdī, kad divi viltīgi bandīti saņem viņu gūstā, piestiprina viņam spridzekli un uzdod aplaupīt banku. Tieši dienā, kad viņš sastrīdējies ar savu labāko draugu.

programme.title: Matrikss
programme.desc: Tomasa Andersona dzīve neatšķiras no daudzām citām – kā programmu tehniķis dienā un hakeris naktī viņš aizvada vienmuļu ikdienu pie sava datora monitora. Tomēr viņš jūt, ka tajā visā kaut kas nav kārtībā, un viņu nepamet nojauta, ka gaidāms kas svarīgs. Kādu nakti Tomasu uzmeklē noslēpumaina sieviete un iepazīstina ar tēlu, kuru viņš bija gaidījis – Morfeju. Morfejs atklāj Tomasam patiesību – pār pasauli valda roboti, kas apveltīti ar mākslīgo intelektu. Viņi izmanto cilvēkus kā enerģijas avotu, un, lai kontrolētu cilvēku prātus, radīta virtuālā pasaule – Matrikss. Tā dzimst Neo, kuru nu gaida nežēlīga cīņa pret nezināmu varu.

programme.title: Tuvāk
programme.desc: No mīlestības mēs parasti atceramies kā tā sākās un kā - beidzās, un mēģinām atjaunot atmiņā kas īsti notika pa vidu. "Tuvāk" ir stāsts par četriem sākotnēji savstarpēji svešiem cilvēkiem, kurus satuvina acumirklīga iekāre. Nepārvaramajai kaislei seko neuzticība, jo viņi visi ir ļaudis, kuri tic mīlestībai no pirmā acu skatiena. Atkal un atkal.

programme.title: Aplaupīt 30 minūtēs

programme.title: Vīramāte-vellamāte
programme.desc: Apburošā Šarlote beidzot ir sastapusi savu ideālo vīrieti - ārstu Kevinu Fīldsu. Abu laimei ir tikai viens šķērslis - Kevina māte! Valdonīgā un nepastāvīgā Viola Fīldsa, kura tikko zaudējusi televīzijas šova vadītājas vietu, nu visu uzmanību pievērsusi dēla karjerai. Baidoties pazaudēt arī dēla uzmanību, Viola nolemj izjaukt viņa laulības un kļūst par īstu vellamāti. Tomēr Šarlote nav ar pliku roku ņemama - viņa nedomā padoties nākamās vīramātes spiedienam, un spalvas iet pa gaisu! Kura uzvarēs? Galvenajās lomās: Dženifera Lopeza, Džeina Fonda, Maikls Vartans.

programme.title: Sekss un lielpilsēta
programme.desc: Kerijas Bredšovas sapnis beidzot ir piepildījies – viņa precēsies ar Lielisko vīrieti. Viņš jau reiz ir bijis laulībā, tāpēc vēlas nelielas svinības, taču Kerija, pielaikojot labāko dizaineru kāzu kleitas, ātri vien aizraujas ar domu par modes dāmas sapņu kāzām. Pēc sarunas ar Mirandu, kura būtībā runā par savas laulības problēmām, Lielisko vīrieti pārņem šaubas. Stīva un Mirandas attiecībās iestājies panīkums, tāpēc abi pārguļ ar citiem cilvēkiem un galu galā izšķiras. Kad Lieliskais vīrietis pamet Keriju pie altāra, draudzenes dodas ceļojumā, kam bija jākļūst par jaunā pāra medusmēnesi. Draudzenes ir lieliska kompānija, taču Kerija nespēj uzreiz atgūt dzīvesprieku. Samantu kaitina prombūtne no arvien nevaļīgākā Smita, kura aktiera karjera uzņem apgriezienus, tāpēc viņa izseko glīto jaunekli. Valentīna dienā Miranda atzīstas Kerijai, ka ir vainojama Lieliskā vīrieša bēgšanā. Rezultātā Kerija izlīgst ar savu mīļoto, un abi salaulājas miertiesneša kabinetā.

programme.title: Roķīgā mamma
programme.desc: Rikija ir izvēlējusies savu ceļu - tā ir mūzika. Ģimeni viņa atstāja otrajā plānā, no vīra ir šķīrusies un no saviem jau pieaugušajiem bērniem atsvešinājusies. Rikijas dzīve joprojām ir viens vienīgs rokenrols, īpaši par rītdienu nedomājot. Kādu dienu viņa saņem zvanu no bijušā vīra, kurš lūdz palīdzību - abu kopīgo meitu ir pametis vīrs, un viņa ir iekritusi depresijā. Vai mamma varēs palīdzēt? To neviens nezina, taču Rikija dodas ceļā. Ceļā uz mājām, ceļā uz pagātnes kļūdām un ceļā atpakaļ pie ģimenes.

programme.title: Vīramāte-vellamāte

programme.title: Garšīgi
programme.desc: Francija, 1789. gads, īsi pirms revolūcijas. Ar pārsteidzoši talantīgas jaunas sievietes palīdzību pavārs, kuru atlaidis viņa dižciltīgais saimnieks, atrod spēku atbrīvoties no kalpa amata un atver pirmo restorānu pasaulē.

programme.title: Pussagrūšana
programme.desc: Pēc vīra nāves Hanna mēģina turpināt dzīvi. Viņa raksta grāmatu par savu vīru, kurš bijis populārs mūziķis, kad negaidīti viņas dzīvē uzrodas pašpārliecināts rakstnieks Endrjū no Ņujorkas, kuram ir cits skatījums uz Hannas vīra dzīvi un arī nāvi. Abu iepazīšanās nesākas uz tās patīkamākās nots, taču kas zina - kā izvērsīsies. Galvenajās lomās: Rebeka Hola, Džeisons Sudeikis, Blaita Danere

programme.title: Pussagrūšana
programme.desc: Pēc vīra nāves Hanna mēģina turpināt dzīvi. Viņa raksta grāmatu par savu vīru, kurš bijis populārs mūziķis, kad negaidīti viņas dzīvē uzrodas pašpārliecināts rakstnieks Endrjū no Ņujorkas, kuram ir cits skatījums uz Hannas vīra dzīvi un arī nāvi. Abu iepazīšanās nesākas uz tās patīkamākās nots, taču kas zina - kā izvērsīsies. Galvenajās lomās: Rebeka Hola, Džeisons Sudeikis, Blaita Danere

programme.title: Melnā kaste
programme.desc: Kas notika reisā Dubaija–Parīze, pirms lidmašīna nokrita Alpos? Katastrofas galvenajam izmeklētājam Matjē Vasēram šī ir pirmā nopietnā civilās aviācijas negadījuma izmeklēšana. Vai notikušais ir pilota kļūda, tehniska kļūme vai tomēr terorakts? Rūpīgi izanalizējot melnās kastes saturu, Matjē aptver, ka izmeklēšana jāveic slepenībā. Taču viņš pat nenojauš, cik tālu patiesības meklējumi viņu aizvedīs.

programme.title: Te nu viņa ir
programme.desc: Filma vēsta par rūdītu egoistu Orenu, kura dzīves mērķis ir rūpes par sevi. Piepeši viss mainās. Nez no kurienes uzradies dēls atstāj Orenam pieskatīt mazmeitu, par kuras esamību viņam līdz šim nav bijis ne jausmas. Cenzdamies tikt galā ar negaidīto vectētiņa lomu, vīrietis ir spiests lūgt kaimiņienes palīdzību. Drīz vien top skaidrs, ka arī viņai ir savdabīgs dzīves skatījums, viņa negrasās samierināties ar Orena nejauko raksturu. Galu galā vienam no viņiem ir jāmet kažoks uz otru pusi.

programme.title: Brīvsoļa meklētājs
programme.desc: Stāsts par aizbēgušu pāri, kas devušies neaizmirstamā ceļojumā savā vecajā kempinga automašīnā ar nosaukumu "The Leisure Seeker".

programme.title: Joprojām Alise
programme.desc: Slavenās Kolumbijas Universitātes valodniecības profesores Alises Houlandas dzīve neatgriezeniski mainās brīdī, kad viņi aci pret aci sastopas ar sirdi plosošo diagnozi - agrīna Alcheimera slimība. Lai kā Alise censtos cīnīties ar slimību, viņas vīrs un trīs bērni ir liecinieki tam, kā kādreiz dzīvespriecīgā sieviete ar katru dienu arvien vairāk attālinās no reālās pasaules. Aizkustinošs stāsts par sievietes cīņu ar Alcheimera slimību, izmisumu un nolemtības sajūtu, par vīra pašaizliedzīgo mīlestību pret sievu un drosmi būt blakus, zinot, ka pienāks diena, kad Alise viņu vairs neatcerēsies. Galvenajās lomās Džūliana Mūra, Aleks Boldvins, Kristena Stjuarte.

programme.title: Midltonā
programme.desc: Divi vecāki vien vienas dienas laikā viens otrā iemīlas, neatļauti nepiedaloties viņu bērnu skolas tūrē.

programme.title: Takas
programme.desc: Šajā dramatiskajā stāstā Mia Vasikovska atveido rakstnieci Robinu Deividsoni. Filma vēsta par Deividsones 2700 km garo ceļojumu pāri Austrālijas tuksnesim. Kopā ar četriem kamieļiem un uzticamo suni viņa devās ceļā no Alisspringsas līdz Indijas okeānam. Pārgājiena laikā sieviete atklās patieso vientulības vērtību, kā arī no jauna atskārtīs, ko nozīmē īstena saikne ar pasauli. Lai iegūtu finansējumu savam piedzīvojumam, Deividsone negribīgi piekrīt, ka to iemūžinās "National Geographic" fotogrāfs Riks Smolans (Ādams Draivers). Lai gan sākumā viņi nesaprotas, jo Deividsone alkst pēc vientulības, taču laika gaitā abu attiecības pārvēršas īstā draudzībā

programme.title: Kas skatāms Filmzone Plus?
programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone Plus filmām.

programme.title: Zoe Bakes
programme.desc: Zoë shares her favourite strategies for healthy baking. She makes Morning Cookies, a guilt-free, grab-and-go nutritious snack, and tiramisu in single-serve jars.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman

programme.title: BBQ Brawl: Flay V. Symon
programme.desc: Join our hosts, renowned celebrity chefs and restaurateurs Bobby Flay and Michael Symon, as they test the skills of eight expert barbecue connoisseurs. Filmed at the Star Hill Ranch in Austin, Texas, the eight chefs are divided into two teams but, in order to claim first pick for their team, Bobby and Michael go head-to-head in a backyard BBQ challenge. Each episode sees one of the chefs being eliminated from the show until there is only one left, the winner who is awarded the title of Master of Cue. The weekly contests aim to reveal the chefs talents and expose their weaknesses and include tasks such as cooking up a tomahawk rib-eye and taking on a Texas beef challenge.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: After combating countless "impossible dinners," Chef Robert Irvine faces a daunting new challenge: save Americas most desperate restaurants from impending failure in just two days with only $10,000. In his new prime-time Food Network series, Restaurant: Impossible, Robert uses creativity and resourcefulness along with a lot of muscle in his fight to rescue these restaurants and give hope to the owners and their employees. Day one of the extreme mission begins with a thorough business assessment as Robert launches the restaurant into full service, closely observes the staff and kitchen, and determines their weakest spots. Then, he springs into action by updating the menu, retraining the staff and implementing aesthetic changes with the help of his design team. To ensure a packed house for the grand re-opening at the end of day two, Robert hits the streets to tell the community about the improved restaurant. Will the ruthless schedule, tight budget and ambitious task overcome Roberts lofty goals, or will this tall order result in restaurant triumph?

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Two talented chefs go head-to-head for the chance to Beat Bobby Flay. To get to Bobby the chefs must first face off against each other, creating a spectacular dish with a secret ingredient of Bobbys choice. Judges Alex Guarnaschelli and Jeff Mauro know Bobbys strengths and his weaknesses. Their goal: Pick the chef who has the skills to take down Bobby Flay in his own arena. The winning chef gets to challenge Bobby with his or her surprise signature dish. If Bobby goes down, the winner can tell the world, "I beat Bobby Flay!"

In each challenge the contestants, ranging in age from 10 to 13, will be tested on their baking skills and originality as they whip up delectable desserts, including creative cakes, mouthwatering cookies and pastries.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Candy Land
programme.desc: Five teams of professional cake makers compete in a series of testing challenges, with the winning team taking home a whopping $25,000. Each team is challenged to create a stunning, edible showpiece, but they are also given further instructions as the show progresses. They must use all of their artistry, flair and baking talent to have any chance of impressing the judges and taking home the winnings.

programme.title: Paul Hollywood City Bakes
programme.desc: Paul Hollywood City Bakes is hosted by the British most loved baker, Paul Hollywood, who explores 10 cities around the globe. He is looking for the family bakeries, corner delis and luxury hotels which have created the baking heritage of entire cities. From Cape Town to Reykjavik, Paul will personally guide into the tastiest baking to be found there, each cities own culture and unique history. Exploring the sights of each city Paul gets inspired and creates two unique recipes of his own.

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: In Food Networks series Kids Baking Championship, hosts and judges Duff Goldman and Valerie Bertinelli will lead eight talented kid bakers through challenges designed to find the most-impressive and creative young baker. In each challenge the contestants, ranging in age from 10 to 13, will be tested on their baking skills and originality as they whip up delectable desserts, including creative cakes, mouthwatering cookies and pastries.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods
programme.desc: Travel and cuisine documentary series, hosted by famous Andrew Zimmern, American culinary expert, chef, restaurateur and television personality and spin-off series of Bizarre Foods, focuses on classic, iconic foods (not bizarre like in the original series) from some well-known destinations- moussaka and real Greek yogurt from Athens, sweet macarons and crepes from Paris, Italian gelato, gooey fondue to Swiss chocolate from Zurich, mile-high pastrami sandwiches and bagels from NYC, and many other legendary foods. The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

To ensure a packed house for the grand re-opening at the end of day two, Robert hits the streets to tell the community about the improved restaurant. Will the ruthless schedule, tight budget and ambitious task overcome Roberts lofty goals, or will this tall order result in restaurant triumph?

programme.title: Candy Land
programme.desc: Five teams of professional cake makers compete in a series of testing challenges, with the winning team taking home a whopping $25,000. Each team is challenged to create a stunning, edible showpiece, but they are also given further instructions as the show progresses. They must use all of their artistry, flair and baking talent to have any chance of impressing the judges and taking home the winnings.

programme.title: Paul Hollywood City Bakes
programme.desc: Paul Hollywood City Bakes is hosted by the British most loved baker, Paul Hollywood, who explores 10 cities around the globe. He is looking for the family bakeries, corner delis and luxury hotels which have created the baking heritage of entire cities. From Cape Town to Reykjavik, Paul will personally guide into the tastiest baking to be found there, each cities own culture and unique history. Exploring the sights of each city Paul gets inspired and creates two unique recipes of his own.

programme.title: BBQ Brawl: Flay V. Symon
programme.desc: Join our hosts, renowned celebrity chefs and restaurateurs Bobby Flay and Michael Symon, as they test the skills of eight expert barbecue connoisseurs. Filmed at the Star Hill Ranch in Austin, Texas, the eight chefs are divided into two teams but, in order to claim first pick for their team, Bobby and Michael go head-to-head in a backyard BBQ challenge. Each episode sees one of the chefs being eliminated from the show until there is only one left, the winner who is awarded the title of Master of Cue. The weekly contests aim to reveal the chefs talents and expose their weaknesses and include tasks such as cooking up a tomahawk rib-eye and taking on a Texas beef challenge.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Two talented chefs go head-to-head for the chance to Beat Bobby Flay. To get to Bobby the chefs must first face off against each other, creating a spectacular dish with a secret ingredient of Bobbys choice. Judges Alex Guarnaschelli and Jeff Mauro know Bobbys strengths and his weaknesses. Their goal: Pick the chef who has the skills to take down Bobby Flay in his own arena. The winning chef gets to challenge Bobby with his or her surprise signature dish. If Bobby goes down, the winner can tell the world, "I beat Bobby Flay!"

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods
programme.desc: Travel and cuisine documentary series, hosted by famous Andrew Zimmern, American culinary expert, chef, restaurateur and television personality and spin-off series of Bizarre Foods, focuses on classic, iconic foods (not bizarre like in the original series) from some well-known destinations- moussaka and real Greek yogurt from Athens, sweet macarons and crepes from Paris, Italian gelato, gooey fondue to Swiss chocolate from Zurich, mile-high pastrami sandwiches and bagels from NYC, and many other legendary foods. The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

programme.title: Supermarket Stakeout
programme.desc: Supermarket Stakeout is an American cooking competition TV series presented by chef Alex Guarnaschelli. Every participant of the show has a budget of $500 to purchase the groceries from the customers of a nearby supermarket, and create dishes later out of it. In each round the host assigns the theme of the dish to cook. The chef whose dish is judged the least satisfactory is eliminated from the competition, and the final chef remaining gets a prize of $10,000.

programme.title: Harry Potter: Wizards of Baking
programme.desc: James and Oliver Phelps host as pairs of professional bakers create spellbinding edible showpieces on the actual Harry Potter film sets. Guest actors from the films share behind-the-scenes experiences as they join judges Carla Hall and Jozef Youssef.

programme.title: Ciao House
programme.desc: Hosts and judges Alex Guarnaschelli and Gabe Bertaccini welcome 10 talented chefs to Ciao House, where they will live together in a beautiful Tuscan villa and be tested like never before on their proficiency with Italian cuisine. Two chefs receive a huge advantage going into the next round, and one chef must say "Ciao Ciao" to the villa.

programme.title: Sensitive Content
programme.desc: Heroes of the project " Contents "sensitive nature" - people who looking at war through the lens . Stas Kozlyuk, Ephraim Lukatsky , Olga Kovaleva and their colleagues in the shop chose his/her own camera as a tool , not a weapon . This a story about the fine line between professional debt and personal trauma, about attempts save humanity , documenting the disaster. Their work is not just fixing destruction , it is a living memory and testimony truth that is impossible ignore.

Every day. Trusted source.

programme.title: Taisnīguma bruņinieki
programme.desc: Galvenā varoņa sieva iet bojā dzelzceļa katastrofā. Tā sākas stāsts par trakāko un atriebīgāko izmeklēšanu, uz ko spējīga karavīra, hakera un divu dīvainu matemātiķu kompānija.

programme.title: Saules krasts
programme.desc: Filmas režisores Činnas dzīves iedvesmots stāsts par pusaudzi, kura ir spiesta rūpēties par savu slimo brāli un bezbailīgo māti. Dzīvojot aprūpes namā, viņa iepazīstas ar ekscentrisku aktīvistu, kurš protestē pret vienu no visu laiku ievērojamākajiem medicīnas gadījumiem.

programme.title: Zaļknābis pie stūres
programme.desc: Viņš ir ļoti jauns un prot ļoti ātri un labi braukt, kad jātiek prom no nozieguma vietas. Tas ir neviens cits kā labākais auto vadītājs, saukts par Mazo. Kad Mazais satiek savu sapņu meiteni, viņš vēlas pamest noziedzīgo pasauli. Taču tas nav tik vienkārši, kā šķiet, kad Mazais tiek iesaistīts vēl vienā noziegumā, kas apdraud viņa dzīvi, mīlestību un brīvību.

programme.title: Neiznīcināmie
programme.desc: Bruņoti līdz zobiem, bet vai tiešām neiznīcināmi? Komanda cieš zaudējumus: Bārnijs Ross izstājas no ierindas, bet Lī Kristmasam anulē pielaidi pie turpmākajām operācijām. Vienībai pievienojas jauni kaujinieki, kuriem jāpadara iesāktais līdz galam, taču arī viņi cieš neveiksmi. Tagad Lī vienatnē nāksies iekļūt ienaidnieka midzenī un atbrīvot sagūstīto komandu, paralēli novēršot globāla mēroga katastrofu. Tikai tā ir iespējams izglābt pasauli un atjaunot Neiznīcināmo reputāciju.

programme.title: Madagaskaras pingvīni
programme.desc: Bezbailīgie pingvīni Kapteinis, Kovalskis, Riko un Ierindnieks, kuri ir labākie spiegi, kādi jebkad izšķīlušies no olas, apvieno spēkus ar smalku slepeno organizāciju "Ziemeļvējš". Izskatīgā un brašā aģenta Slepenā vadībā viņiem kopā jāaptur ļaunais doktors Oktāvijs Brīze, kurš ir nodomājis iznīcināt pasauli.

programme.title: Mīluļi apvienojas
programme.desc: Klusā, bet ļoti mūsdienīgā pilsētā Robo notiek kas neredzēts un nedzirdēts. Mērs Frenks ir zaudējis prātu. Viņa plāns neiekļaujas nekādos rāmjos. Tikai paklausieties! Viņam apnikuši cilvēki un dzīvnieki, tāpēc viņš savā prātā perina plānu – visus iedzīvotājus un mājdzīvniekus izdzīt no pilsētas un viņu mājas atdot robotiem! Kad suns bez pajumtes Rodžers uzzina šo jaunumu, viņam visas spalvas saceļas stāvus. Šis Robins Huds daudz laika pavadījis uz ielas, nočiepis dažu labu gardas desas luņķi, lai to atdotu vājākiem dzīvniekiem, un nu jūt, ka mēra plāns pie laba gala nenovedīs. No pilsētas pazudīs dzīvība! Atgriezies no jaukas pastaigas kopā ar daiļo Siāmas kaķenīti Bellu, Rodžers šausmās sastingst. Roboti sagrāvuši viņa vienīgo būdiņu! Mukdams, ko nagi nes, Rodžers piepeši satiek labsirdīgo robotu Bobu, kuram arī mēra nodoms šķiet briesmīgs. Ir jārīkojas! Jāglābjas pašiem un jāglābj citi. Ja nekas netiks darīts, greznā mājdzīvnieku viesnīca būs briesmās. Nenojauzdami nekā ļauna, tajā mitinās daudzi četrkājainie.

programme.title: Ķieģeli pa ķieģelītim
programme.desc: Animācijas filma "Lego" klucīšu stilā par Farela Viljamsa dzīvi. Filmā, kurā galvenās lomas ierunājis pats Farels Viljamss (Pharrell Williams), kā arī Kendriks Lamārs (Kendrick Lamar) un Džastins Timberleiks (Justin Timberlake), ķieģelīti pa ķieģelītim tiek pārskatīta mākslinieka karjera.

programme.title: Lepnā princese
programme.desc: Jaunajam un izskatīgajam karalim Bendžaminam ir pienācis laiks precēties. Viņu savaldzina princeses Karolīnas portrets. Kad princese viņu atraida, karalis, pārģērbies par dārznieku, iekļūst Karolīnas pilī un iekaro viņas sirdi.

programme.title: Varenais Ričards
programme.desc: Zvirbulis Ričijs kopš dzimšanas pieņemts stārķu ģimenē, visi viņu ļoti mīl, viņš ātri aug un jūtas kā īsts stārķis. Taču gājputniem stārķiem pienāk laiks lidot uz Āfriku, lai tur ziemotu. Ģimene ir spiesta atklāt Ričijam viņa izcelšanos, jo lidot kopā nedrīkst – grūtajā ceļojumā zvirbulis var iet bojā. Drosminieks negrasās nolaist spārnus un nolemj visiem pierādīt, ka ir īsts stārķis. Ričijs viens pats dodas ceļā, un viņam pievienojas jauni draugi – pūce Olga un papagailis Kiki.

programme.title: Krūdi
programme.desc: Aizvēsturiska piedzīvojumu komēdija par pasaules pirmo ģimeni, kura dodas unikālā ceļojumā, kad viņu dzimtā ala tiek iznīcināta. Ceļojot pa elpu aizraujošajām ainavām, Krūdi atklāj pasakainu, jaunu vietu, kur mīt vēl neredzētas būtnes. Viņu pasaules uztvere mainās uz visiem laikiem.

programme.title: Konklāvs
programme.desc: Pēc pāvesta negaidītās nāves katoļu kardinālu kolēģija sapulcējas Vatikānā uz vēlēšanām, lai izvēlētos jauno pāvestu un iezīmētu jauno baznīcas laikmetu. Aiz Siksta kapelas slēgtajām durvīm kardināli no visas pasaules sacenšas par šo godu rūpīgi sargātā rituālā, kas sakņojas gadsimtiem tālā pagātnē. Kardinālam Lorensam (Reifs Fainss), kardinālu kolēģijas dekānam, ir svētais pienākums pārraudzīt šo konklāvu.

programme.title: Maģiskās durvis
programme.desc: Divi praktikanti Pols un Sofija uzsāk karjeru noslēpumainā Londonas uzņēmumā "J.W. Wells and Co". Drīz abi atklāj, ka viņu darba devēji, tostarp harizmātiskais izpilddirektors Hamfrijs Velss un menedžeris Deniss Taners, ievieš revolucionāras pārmaiņas – modernās korporatīvās stratēģijas te tiek apvienotas ar senām burvestībām. Uzņēmuma noslēpumam nākot gaismā, Sofijai un Polam tiek dots uzdevums: atrast spēcīgu maģisku artefaktu - durvis, kas ikvienu acumirklī var aizvest uz jebkuru vietu pasaulē. Tas izrādīsies mīklām, izaicinājumiem un pārdabiskām intrigām pilns ceļojums, jo izgaismos bīstamu patiesību, kas slēpjas aiz "J.Wells and Co".

programme.title: Ja es spētu izstāstīt
programme.desc: Denijs Svifts ir pirmās formulas sacīkšu braucējs, taču bez autosporta viņš dievina arī savu skaisto sievu, mazo meitiņu un labāko draugu suni Enzo, kurš nākamajā dzīvē vēlas pārdzimt kā cilvēks. Suņu mīļotāji allaž uzskata, ka viņu suņi ir pilntiesīgi ģimenes locekļi, kuri spēj saprast cilvēku sacīto, izprot notikumus un ir uzticami līdz savai pēdējai stundiņai. Un nudien - tieši tāds suns ir Enzo. Viņa ikdiena lielākoties aizrit, skatoties televīziju un apgūstot visu iespējamo par sava īpašnieka lielāko aizraušanos - braukšanu ar sacīkšu auto. Viņš piedzīvo gan Denija laulības, gan viņu meitas Zojas piedzimšanu. Savas spēcīgās ožas dēļ viņš ir arī pirmais, kurš saprot, ka Denija sievai attīstās smadzeņu vēzis...

programme.title: Pasakainais četrinieks
programme.desc: Filma vēsta par divām draudzenēm, kuras dodas ceļojumā, lai būtu līgavas māsas savai koledžas draudzenei pārsteiguma kāzās.

programme.title: Nelikumība
programme.desc: Patiess stāsts par nelāgas slavas apvītajiem Bondurānu brāļiem – trim kukurūzas kandžas dzinējiem, kuri cenšas sasniegt amerikāņu sapni laikā, kad valda sausais likums. Virdžīnijā, Frenklinas apgabala kalnos, pārdzīvojuši karu, Bondurānu brāļi ar ieročiem cīnās par savu biznesu un ģimenes cieņu un kļūst par vietējo leģendu. Kamēr jaunākais brālis Džeks met acis uz skaisto Bertu, vienmēr drūmais vidējais brālis Forests visus tur aizdomās par krāpšanu, vecākajam – Hovardam – nākas risināt riskantā ģimenes biznesa problēmas. Laiki nav no vieglajiem, un štatā valda bezdarbs, taču Bondurāni ir uzņēmēji, kas aizsākuši plaukstošu vietējo biznesu, dzenot stipru un iecienītu sīvo, kas iesaukts par "mēnesnīcu". Taču kandžas dzinēju labās dienas Frenklinas apgabalā iet uz galu, jo pilsētā no Čikāgas ieradies specaģents Čārlijs Reiks. Jaunais "likums", ko pūlas iedibināt Reiks, nes nāvi un veicina korupciju. Tas rada šķēršļus brāļu iecerēm un ideāliem. Tomēr Bondurāni ir apņēmušies nelocīt ceļus neviena priekšā.

programme.title: Pārdozēšana
programme.desc: Filmas notikumi seko Sārai, Tulūzas narkotiku apkarošanas grupas vadītājai, un Ričardam, vietējās kriminālpolicijas bosam. Sāra spiesta sadarboties ar Ričardu, lai apturētu metamfetamīna tirgošanu starp Spāniju un Franciju un atrastu slepkavu, kas saistīts ar šo lietu.

programme.title: Bildinājums
programme.desc: Ambiciozā Ņujorkas izdevniecības vadītāja Margareta ir gatavā vellata, un viņas darbinieki visi kā viens dabū no bargās priekšnieces trūkties. Īpaši smagi klājas asistentam Endrjū, kuram Margaretas dēļ nākas strādāt pat brīvdienās. Taču kādu dienu nevainojamajai Margaretas dzīvei rodas nopietns apdraudējums – uzturēšanās atļauja ASV ir beigusies un viņai draud deportācija uz dzimto Kanādu. Lai nepazaudētu prestižo darbu, viņai atliek tikai viena iespēja – likt kādam no saviem padotajiem viņu bildināt un noslēgt fiktīvas laulības. Pirmais Margaretas ceļā trāpās Endrjū.

programme.title: Atsitiens
programme.desc: Endrjū ir jauns un ambiciozs džeza bundzinieks, gatavs kļūt par labāko no labākajiem ASV austrumu krasta mūzikas vidusskolā, atspēriena punktā uz lielo skatuvi. Despotiskais pasniedzējs Terenss pamana Endrjū un iekļauj viņu džeza orķestra sastāvā, uz visiem laikiem izmainot jaunieša dzīvi. Endrjū vēlme kļūt par labāko drīz pārvēršas apsēstībā, un Terensa nežēlīgās mācību metodes nostāda viņu gan uz fizisko spēju, gan arī saprāta robežas. Filma saņēmusi galveno žūrijas balvu un skatītāju balvu Sandensas filmu festivālā, trīs "Oskarus" kategorijās "Labākais otrā plāna aktieris", "Labākā montāža", "Labākā skaņas apstrāde", tāpat arī trīs britu "BAFTA" balvas. Filmas režisors ir Deimiens Čazels, kurš ir ieguvis arī "Oskaru" par muzikālo drāmu "La La Land: Kalifornijas sapņi" 32 gadu vecumā, tādejādi kļūstot par jaunāko režisoru, kurš ieguvis Amerikas Kinoakadēmijas prestižo apbalvojumu.

programme.title: Madagaskara
programme.desc: Lauva Alekss ir Ņujorkas Centrālparka zoodārza karalis. Arī viņa labākie draugi zebra Mārtijs, žirafe Melmens un nīlzirgu meitene Glorija visu dzīvi šajā idilliskajā nebrīvē saņēmuši zoodārza apmeklētāju apbrīnu. Taču Mārtijs klusībā kaļ plānus par bēgšanu, un ar dažu apbrīnojami uzņēmīgu pingvīnu palīdzību viņam izdodas izrauties pasaulē, ko viņš sen sapņojis iepazīt. Alekss, Melmens un Glorija viņam seko, taču tiek notverti un nosūtīti uz Āfriku. Kad pingvīni sabotē kuģa komandu, Alekss, Mārtijs, Melmens un Glorija attopas izskaloti eksotiskās Madagaskaras krastā. Nu četriem ņujorkiešiem nākas izdzīvot savvaļā, un tas ir sasodīti grūti.

programme.title: Runcis zābakos
programme.desc: Vēl pirms leģendārais Runcis Zābakos satiek mums visiem jau zināmo zaļo briesmoni, vārdā Šreks, viņš dodas varonīgiem piedzīvojumiem pilnā ceļojumā, lai kopā ar ideju meistaru Oliņu Aleksandru Boliņu un drosmīgo kaķenīti Kitiju Maigķepu nozagtu Zosi, kas dēj zelta olas. Tas tik būs viens varens un deviņu dzīvību vērts piedzīvojums!

programme.title: Zaķu skola: Misija Olas
programme.desc: Īsi pirms Lieldienām svinīgā rituālā maģiskā Zelta ola palīdz noskaidrot zaķu čempionus. Un pirmo reizi zaķu skolas vēsturē izvēlēts arī pilsētas zaķis - un tas ir Makss! Vaļoties Maksam vairs itin nemaz nav laika, jo viņam kopā ar Lieldienu zaķa draugiem jāpilnveido savas prasmes. Tomēr pirms paša pirmā treniņa zaķu maģiskā spēka avots Zelta ola kļūst melna. Pie vainas ir bandas vadonis Leo, kurš nevēlas, lai Lieldienas notiku. Ko nu?!

programme.title: Nejaukais es
programme.desc: Superļaundaris Gru ir izmests no darba, jo neapturēja jaunāko cilvēces apdraudētāju. Viņš zaudē dzīvesprieku, bet to atgūst, kad uzzina, ka viņa neredzētais dvīņubrālis Dru vēlas viņu satikt. Gru ar ģimeni dodas uz brāļa grezno dzīvesvietu. Brāļi kopā uzsāks cīņu pret Baltazaru Bretu, kurš bērnībā bija slavenība, taču tagad kļuvis par superļaundari, kurš terorizē pasauli. Minioni uzsāk protesta streiku pret to, ka Gru vispār neinteresē iespēja valdīt pār pasauli.

programme.title: Kā Grinčs nozaga Ziemassvētkus
programme.desc: Vūvila ir maza, brīnumaina pilsētiņa, kas atrodas sniegpārsliņā. Visiem Vūvivas iedzīvotājiem ļoti patīk Ziemassvētki. Taču pilsētiņas tuvumā mīt Grinčs – ļoti nejauks radījums, kuram riebjas gan Ziemassvētki, gan arī vūvilieši, jo tie savulaik viņu izstūmuši no sava vidus. Redzot, kā viņi priecājas un gaida svētkus, Grinčs nolemj nozagt visas Ziemassvētku dāvanas. Bet varbūt kādai mazai meitenītei izdosies sadraudzēties ar Grinču un likt viņam mainīt savus plānus?

programme.title: Ugunīgi ass
programme.desc: Iedvesmojošs stāsts par Ričardu Montanezu, uzkodu ražotāja "Frito Lay" apkopēju, kurš, pateicoties savai meksikāņu izcelsmei, palīdzēja sapurināt pārtikas industriju, palīdzot radīt vienus no visu laiku populārākajiem čipsiem "Flamin Hot Cheetos".

programme.title: Ledus laikmets: Lielā sadursme
programme.desc: Skreta (Kriss Vedžs) nepārtrauktie pūliņi noglabāt savu zīli liek viņam izraisīt negadījumu virkni, kuru rezultātā asteroīdi sāk traukties uz Zemi. Haoss liek Manijam (Rejs Romano), Djego (Deniss Līrijs), Sidam (Džons Legvizamo) un viņu ģimenēm meklēt patvērumu. Piedzīvojumu meklētāja zebiekste Baks (Saimons Pegs) viņus brīdina, ka var sākties masveida izmiršana, kas liek draugiem meklēt jaunu mājvietu, pa ceļam satiekot citus dzīvniekus un apmeklējot eksotiskas vietas.

programme.title: Ingrīda - pašiņu karaliene
programme.desc: Ingrīda (Obrija Plaza) ir īstena sociālo tīklu stalkere, kuras dzīvē viens nejauši nospiests LIKE jau ir pielīdzināms īstai draudzībai, pat ja otra puse par to nemaz nenojauš. Teilore Slouna (Elizabete Olsena) ir atzīta Losandželosas sociālo tīklu karaliene un Instagrama zvaigzne, kuras līdz pēdējam pikselim noslīpētā, perfektā dzīve kļūst par Ingrīdas jaunāko apsēstību. Kad Ingrīda ar viltu ienāk Teilores dzīvē, viņu attiecības no #BFF ātri vien kļūst par #WTF. Un tas ir tikai sākums...

programme.title: Pērtiķu planētas karaliste
programme.desc: Daudzus gadus pēc Cēzara valdīšanas jauns pērtiķis dodas ceļojumā, kas liks viņam apšaubīt visu, kas viņam ir mācīts par pagātni, un izdarīt izvēli, kas noteiks gan pērtiķu, gan cilvēku nākotni...

programme.title: Lisa Frankenšteina
programme.desc: Mīlas stāsts starp pusaudzi un viņas iemīļoto, un tā iznācis, ka viņš ir... mironis. Šausminošu apstākļu sakritības mīļoto atgriež dzīvē, un abi dodas ceļojumā, lai atrastu mīlestību, laimi un dažas trūkstošās ķermeņa daļas.

programme.title: Viņa atnāca pie manis
programme.desc: Iedvesmu pazaudējis rakstnieks no jauna atrod savu profesionālo kaislību pēc piedzīvojumiem bagāta vienas nakts sakara.

programme.title: Sisu
programme.desc: Dziļi Lapzemes savvaļā Aatami Korpi meklē zeltu. Kad viņš sastopas ar nacistu patruļu, sākas elpu aizraujoša un pēc zelta alkstoša vajāšana pa iznīcināto un mīnēto Lapzemes mežonīgo savvaļu.

programme.title: Copa Del Rey. 1/4 final. Real Betis - Atletico Madrid
programme.desc: Report of soccer games from the Copa del Rey in Spain.

programme.title: Futbols: DFB Kauss. 1/4 fināls. Leverkusen - St. Pauli
programme.desc: Report of matches from the German DFB-Pokal

programme.title: Futbols: DFB Kauss. 1/4 fināls. Holstein Kiel - Stuttgart
programme.desc: Report of matches from the German DFB-Pokal

programme.title: Basketbols: Eirolīga. FC Bayern - AS Monaco
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. programme.title: Bundesliga. St. Pauli - Stuttgart
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. programme.title: Futbols: LaLiga. Athletic Bilbao - Real Sociedad
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Flipping 101 with Tarek El Moussa
programme.desc: Getting into property flipping can be daunting for first-timers, which is why Tarek El Moussa is on hand to share invaluable advice that will put them on course for handsome profits. With years in the industry, Tarek has seen and done it all. Now he wants to draw on some of his own experiences to ensure novice flippers dont make costly mistakes. Aided by Tareks knowledge and a few of his clients, surely nothing can go wrong? Reality series.

programme.title: Castle Impossible
programme.desc: Daphne and Ian plan to build on her grandfathers wedding business. They create an impressive office and a cosy sitting room to host their clients.

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters
programme.desc: Join the family renovating a vacation home in Italys countryside over winter, following Chase, Sarah, their four kids, and dog across six episodes chronicling the projects progress from start to completion.

programme.title: Bahamas Life
programme.desc: The idyllic Bahamas are the perfect getaway for travellers and vacationers alike, but for some, once you visit the paradisaical islands, its hard to forget their beauty. These enamored individuals drop their city lives for these stunning Caribbean shores, leaving their livelihoods, stresses and struggles behind. In each episode of Bahamas Life, we detail the processes involved, the choice of islands and the remarkable real estate opportunities for prospective buyers looking to fulfill their dreams.

programme.title: Bahamas Life

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: Recent lottery winners look for their perfect dream house in this "House Hunters"-inspired reality show. David Bromstad takes recent lottery winners on over-the-top house hunts for their new dream homes. Whether they win hundreds of thousands or hundreds of millions, lucky lottery winners everywhere are jumping headfirst into the real estate market. Will they spend all their winnings on an extravagant mansion or settle for a humble sound investment? Find out what happens when average Americans set out to find "My Lottery Dream Home".

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: Recent lottery winners look for their perfect dream house in this "House Hunters"-inspired reality show. programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Tarek is a self-proclaimed real estate genius with determination and drive. Christina is Tareks picture-perfect wife, who Tareks friends still cant believe he landed. In each episode of "Flip or Flop", Tarek and Christina flip a new property. From the nail-biting purchase at auction, to the frustrating renovations and maddening showings, to the giddy acceptance of an offer, well follow along as these two relatively novice flippers try their hand at the toughest game in town. From purchase to resale, weaving their personal lives within the story of the flip. From paying cash, sight unseen, for a property at auction, through the hapless remodeling process, to the frantic sale, this young couple is putting everything they have into this venture.

programme.title: Fix My Frankenhouse
programme.desc: Boston-based home renovation experts and husband-wife team Mike and Denese Butler fix what they refer to as "Frankenstein" houses. These are older homes that have become filled with wonky layouts, misplaced staircases and maze-like hallways as different owners make changes over the years. Mike employs his construction know-how to create a functional flow, while Denese will capture the clients style with custom finishes. By blending elements of the older homes charm with modern design, the couple will produce stunning and cohesive spaces. Throughtout the episodes, Mike and Denese will overcome choppy rooms and wasted square footage for clients and work with their dads -- master carpenters John Butler and Peter Doyle -- to deliver one-of-a-kind projects for each family.

programme.desc: The idyllic Bahamas are the perfect getaway for travellers and vacationers alike, but for some, once you visit the paradisaical islands, its hard to forget their beauty. programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Join host Tony Harris as he investigates the most mysterious content ever captured and attempts to unearth the truth. Employing the assistance of experts and state-of-the-art technology, Tony is determined to decipher whether these photos, videos and audio recordings of purported supernatural and paranormal events are falsified or for real. He meets with eyewitnesses, conducts tests and stops at nothing to determine the truth.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Long before banks, ATMs and check-cashing services, there were pawn shops. Pawning was the leading form of consumer credit in the United States until the 1950s, and pawn shops are still helping everyday people make ends meet. "Pawn Stars" takes you inside the colorful world of the pawn business. At the Gold and Silver Pawn Shop on the outskirts of Las Vegas, three generations of the Harrison family — grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey — jointly run the family business, and theres clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. The three men use their sharp eyes and skills to assess the value of items from the commonplace to the truly historic, including a 16th-century samurai sword, a Super Bowl ring, a Picasso painting and a 17th-century stay of execution. Its up to them to determine whats real and whats fake, as they reveal the often surprising answer to the questions on everyones mind, "Whats the story behind it?" and "Whats it worth?"

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: For over two centuries, teams of searchers, including Franklin D. Roosevelt, have attempted to crack the code that will unearth the treasure believed to be buried on the small island off the coast of Nova Scotia. Armed with the knowledge of those that came before them, the muscle of heavy machinery and decades of engineering know-how, brothers Rick and Marty Lagina and their partners may be closer than anyone in history to finding the treasure that has so far claimed the lives of six men.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Did scientists studying a 15-ton meteorite discover new minerals that are proof of an alien civilisation? Is a video of a dozen dinosaur-like creatures running out of the waterproof of miniature Loch Ness Monsters?

programme.title: Beyond Oak Island
programme.desc: From the producers of "The Curse of Oak Island" and "The UnXplained" comes an exciting new documentary series, "Beyond Oak Island." Hosted by real-life treasure hunters Rick and Marty Lagina, this eight episode series chronicles the greatest treasure hunts of the past, present and (perhaps) future. "Beyond Oak Island" offers a combination of great story telling, compelling interviews with treasure-hunters, historians and experts, as well as on-location treasure hunts in progress, sometimes with the Laginas themselves. From pirates such as Blackbeard and outlaws like Jesse James, to Aztec gold, priceless historical artifacts from American history and sunken treasure ships, "Beyond Oak Island" digs deep into the many treasure quests across the globe, revealing amazing new details and clues from past searches - and in some cases, advancing the hunt.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island

Its up to them to determine whats real and whats fake, as they reveal the often surprising answer to the questions on everyones mind, "Whats the story behind it?" and "Whats it worth?"

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Forged in Fire
programme.desc: Forged in Fire, an American competition series aired on the History Channel, challenges four new competitors to produce a knife in their own style with a small variety of metal objects to create from. The series, hosted by Wil Willis, consists of a three-round elimination contest to forge bladed weapons, with the final winner receiving $10,000 and the days championship title. Judged by experts in weapon history and use, the last two people standing must create in their own forge a Moro Kris sword, a blade which dates back to 300BC, in just five days. Filmed in Brooklyn, New York, the set referred to as "The Forge" sets the scene for this suspenseful show with propane forges, power hammers and hydraulic presses, with medical personnel being close by to treat any injuries or other health problems. If the medical personnel suspect that the competitors are unable to continue safely, they will be disqualified. Once each competitor has created their weapon, it will be put through a series of tests including chopping/slashing/stabbing objects such as ropes, ice blocks, animal carcasses and steel car doors. Having to meet a number of criterias, the smiths battle it out, without their swords, to become the best black-smith.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Aswang, Crashed on Mars and Giant Wolves. Whats the truth behind the recent sightings of a dreaded Filipino creature known as the Aswang. Is there really a big bad wolf stalking the woods of Saskatchewan?

At the Gold and Silver Pawn Shop on the outskirts of Las Vegas, three generations of the Harrison family — grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey — jointly run the family business, and theres clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. The three men use their sharp eyes and skills to assess the value of items from the commonplace to the truly historic, including a 16th-century samurai sword, a Super Bowl ring, a Picasso painting and a 17th-century stay of execution. Its up to them to determine whats real and whats fake, as they reveal the often surprising answer to the questions on everyones mind, "Whats the story behind it?" and "Whats it worth?"

programme.title: Ancient Aliens Special Presentation
programme.desc: Throughout human history, there have been sudden and dramatic leaps in our evolution that simply cannot be explained by Darwinian theory. Ancient Astronaut theorists propose that the "missing link" is extraterrestrial intervention.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

Its up to them to determine whats real and whats fake, as they reveal the often surprising answer to the questions on everyones mind, "Whats the story behind it?" and "Whats it worth?"

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: For over two centuries, teams of searchers, including Franklin D. Roosevelt, have attempted to crack the code that will unearth the treasure believed to be buried on the small island off the coast of Nova Scotia. Armed with the knowledge of those that came before them, the muscle of heavy machinery and decades of engineering know-how, brothers Rick and Marty Lagina and their partners may be closer than anyone in history to finding the treasure that has so far claimed the lives of six men.
